actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend the National Flood Insurance Program through May 31, 2010.

summary.text: Amends the Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2010, as amended by the Temporary Extension Act of 2010, to extend the National Flood Insurance Program through May 31, 2010.

titles.title: A bill to extend the National Flood Insurance Program through May 31, 2010.
